channel.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Video Podcasts - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Documentary
channel.description: Videos of Maine Ghost Hunters featuring investigations, team documentaries and instructional information sessions.
channel.generator: FeedForAll Mac v2.1 (2.1.0.1) unlicensed version; http://www.FeedForAll.com/
channel.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Documentary
channel.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in Marriotsville, Maryland with paranormal investigation teams from across the country in a combined effort to capture, and document, evidence of paranormal activity on the grounds.
channel.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, paranormal, spirit, haunted, investigation, sanitarium, tuberculosis, hospital, Henryton, documentary
channel.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A1
item.description: Video A-1 shows everyone what the very start of our investigation time looked like. This first building we were in was what the investigation leads decided to call our "home base". We had to walk through the whole building to get to the back porch, where someone was standing guard over any equipment left there during investigation times. On the way out of the building one of the group psychics mentions "slimy ice" and tells us that the spirits are present in our "home base" building.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-1
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in the daytime - A1
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A2
item.description: In video A-2 our group arrives in the basement level of one of the buildings we investigate. Our group psychic experiences paranormal activity almost immediately. Take note - at 3:04 Kat and Jaime both acknowledge they heard something, and within a few seconds the other team radios over to us with an observation.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-2
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in the daytime - A2
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-3
item.description: Video A-3 is roughly 8 minutes of a typical investigation. There is extremely little of this 8 minute clip that has been cut out, so you're seeing a very life-like version of what it's like to be involved, first-hand, in a paranormal investigation. Portions of video that may have been cut out are: when the camera was focused on the floor, or was bobbling around, or when someone swore or said something personally identifying that we do not want available to the public at large. Otherwise, this is all unedited footage.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-3
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in the daytime - A-3
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-4
item.description: Video A-4 is a great exhibition of how different people can have completely different experiences while investigating the paranormal. There are a couple of investigators who are sure they are experiencing the presence of unseen beings, while others make no claim at all, or claim to be having no experiences whatsoever.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-4
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in the daytime - A-4
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-5
item.description: Video A-5 starts with the group leaving the basement level of the building and heading upstairs. As in all of the videos presented here, there may be EVP's present. Some EVP's may be more easily heard than others.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-5
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in the daytime - A-5
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-6
item.description: A lot of Video A-6 illustrates the slower, less involved, moments of a true paranormal investigation. When you're getting to know an area, especially one that's the size of this particular location, you tend to have larger segments of uneventful chunks of time. The larger the location, the more time is likely spent getting to know the environment.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-6
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in the daytime - A-6
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-7
item.description: In video A-7 we begin working with the Ovilus in one of the 1st floor rooms. The Ovlius pretty much speaks for itself (no pun intended) but it'll be interesting to receive feedback from people, to hear what outsiders think of the paranormal gadget.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-x
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in the daytime - A-7
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-8
item.description: Video A-8 Slow moving, seemingly uneventful, but there are brief moments where it really feels/sounds as if we're making contact with an intelligent being. Very interesting at times.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-8
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in the daytime - A-8
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-9
item.description: Video A-9 shows some of the more low-key moments of an investigation. When we move from one room to another, often times we experience this sort of "low" period where little, to nothing happens.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-9
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in the daytime - A-9
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-10
item.description: Video A-10 is another good few minutes of watching and listening to the various experiences of different people who are all in the same room. The Ovilus plays a role in this video segment, as does the psyche of the investigators in this darkened basement room.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-10
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in the daytime - A-10
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-11
item.description: Video A-11 is where we start having possible paranormal activity that team members feel they are experiencing first hand.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-11
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in the daytime - A-11
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-12
item.description: Video A-12 is where we start asking for a "sign". is the communication real? Or coincidence? Are these signs the real deal? Or something less...?
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime A-12
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium in the daytime - A-12
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-1
item.description: Non-Evidence Part of Mini-Doc 1st Night Investigation - Maine Ghost Hunters investigates an abandoned hospital somewhere in the U.S. with teams from across the country in a group effort to capture evidence of paranormal activity on the grounds. This is the first of 2 nights of our collaborative team investigation. This is basically a "what you see is what you get" visual presentation of our arrival on scene, setting up, settling down, and beginning our 1st collaborative PM investigation. In this particular video the audience can gain some insight into the mentality of the team, the vibe of the environment, and general feel of how the night started. It really is the anchor for the progression of videos that will follow this one.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-1
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium during our first of two Night Time sessions - C-1
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-2
item.description: Non-Evidence Part of Mini-Doc 1st Night Investigation - Maine Ghost Hunters investigates an abandoned hospital somewhere in the U.S. with teams from across the country in a group effort to capture evidence of paranormal activity on the grounds. This is the first of 2 nights of our collaborative team investigation. This clip has only, roughly, half of the night's investigators. The other half will be joining this group in a very short while. This segment is of value when looking at it in the sequence of all the night's videos. There are 9 in this series. Observe, as the series progresses and more people with varying personalities and emotional states become involved in the investigation...
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-2
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium during our first of two Night Time sessions - C-2
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-3
item.description: Possible Evidence Part of Mini-Doc 1st Night Investigation - Maine Ghost Hunters investigates an abandoned hospital somewhere in the U.S. with teams from across the country in a group effort to capture evidence of paranormal activity on the grounds. This is the first of 2 nights of our collaborative team investigation. This video exhibits some of what we considered to be possible communication with the unseen. Notice the mentality of the team, the demeanor of the group collective, and the overall vibe of these few minutes. There are 5 investigators working the scene in these 6 minutes, but soon the other 7 will return and the group will grow to 12.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-3
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium during our first of two Night Time sessions - C-3
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-4
item.description: Non-Evidence Part of Mini-Doc 1st Night Investigation - Maine Ghost Hunters investigates an abandoned hospital somewhere in the U.S. with teams from across the country in a group effort to capture evidence of paranormal activity on the grounds. This is the first of 2 nights of our collaborative team investigation. This video clip sees the return of the other half of the team, and a change in direction of the investigation. Observe how the team dynamic shifts as we all come together and our numbers slightly-more-than double. What are your observations?
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime C-4
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium during our first of two Night Time sessions - C-4
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-5
item.description: Non-Evidence Part of Mini-Doc 1st Night Investigation - Maine Ghost Hunters investigates an abandoned hospital somewhere in the U.S. with teams from across the country in a group effort to capture evidence of paranormal activity on the grounds. This is the first of 2 nights of our collaborative team investigation. This video exhibits the differences between smaller and larger groups during investigation times - simply compare it to video C-3. This video also allows us to take notice of the different personalities of the investigators and how these traits affect an environment, the group collective, and the investigation.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime C-5
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium during our first of two Night Time sessions - C-5
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-6
item.description: Non-Evidence Part of Mini-Doc 1st Night Investigation - Maine Ghost Hunters investigates an abandoned hospital somewhere in the U.S. with teams from across the country in a group effort to capture evidence of paranormal activity on the grounds. This is the first of 2 nights of our collaborative team investigation. This video is primarily an EVP session. It's seemingly "simple", on the surface, but is there more to this segment than meets the eye? 12 people all in the same place attempting to make contact with what cannot be seen, and evidence is not readily presenting itself.... could this be leading up to something more?
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-6
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium during our first of two Night Time sessions - C-6
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-7
item.description: Non-Evidence Part of Mini-Doc 1st Night Investigation - Maine Ghost Hunters investigates an abandoned hospital somewhere in the U.S. with teams from across the country in a group effort to capture evidence of paranormal activity on the grounds. This is the first of 2 nights of our collaborative team investigation. This video exhibits how different people perceived their experiences during the short time we were all investigating together. The investigation, quite literally, falls apart in this segment. Notice the difference in personalities and how each person expresses themselves. What's your opinion about what you observe here in this video?
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime C-7
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium during our first of two Night Time sessions - C-7
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-8
item.description: Non-Evidence Part of Mini-Doc 1st Night Investigation - Maine Ghost Hunters investigates an abandoned hospital somewhere in the U.S. with teams from across the country in a group effort to capture evidence of paranormal activity on the grounds. This is the first of 2 nights of our collaborative team investigation. In this clip we watch as the team packs up and heads out, calling the investigation to an end for this evening. It's a great clip to observe the different personalities of the individual investigators during this exit-trip back to our vehicles.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime C-8
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium during our first of two Night Time sessions - C-8
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc First Night C-9
item.description: Non-Evidence Part of Mini-Doc 1st Night Investigation - Maine Ghost Hunters investigates an abandoned hospital somewhere in the U.S. with teams from across the country in a group effort to capture evidence of paranormal activity on the grounds. This is the first of 2 nights of our collaborative team investigation. The final video of the night's events. We all met up at a local parking lot to discuss what had happened during the investigation. This is the run-down by various members of the team... describing their understanding and perception of our shared experiences of the evening. If you've watched all of the 9 videos of this night's investigation session, what's your take on this clip?
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc Daytime C-9
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium during our first of two Night Time sessions - C-9
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc 2nd Night Investigation B-5
item.description: Maine Ghost Hunters, along with paranormal research teams from across the country, investigates the abandoned Henryton Sanitarium, a cottage style TB hospital complex built specifically to handle the African-American population of Maryland during the height of the tuberculosis epidemic.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc 2nd Night Investigation B-5

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc 2nd Night Investigation B-9
item.description: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium. In this clip the "demon" presents itself here through the Ovilus. Maybe we should have listened to it when it started warning us to leave...
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc 2nd Night Investigation B-XX
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium during our 2nd, and final, Night Time session - B-9
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc 2nd Night Investigation B-10
item.description: The investigation gets tense - The investigator that was "attacked" in this segment of the investigation had asked to be allowed to leave the the investigation just moments before. She made it clear she felt like she needed to exit this environment, and felt very uncomfortable. The team leads were somewhat insistent that everybody remain together, so she stayed with the group. What we see here is not an act. Her reaction is as genuine as the reaction of the group. As previously stated, we all left this area immediately thereafter.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Henryton Sanitarium Mini-Doc 2nd Night Investigation B-10
item.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Henryton Sanitarium during our 2nd, and final, Night Time session - B-10
item.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, Henryton, cooperative, investigation, paranormal, Maryland, abandoned, tuberculosis, African-American, hospital
item.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters
